pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rackspace Auth Plugin for OpenStack Clients===========================================.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/rackspace-auth-openstack.png :target: http://badge.fury.io/py/rackspace-auth-openstack.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/rackerlabs/rackspace-auth-openstack.png?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/rackerlabs/rackspace-auth-openstackThis is a plugin for OpenStack Clients which provides client support forRackspace authentication extensions to OpenStack.
